required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Study of Glaukos® Trabecular Micro-Bypass System Model iS3 Infinite® vs. Hydrus®
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Randomized, Controlled, Comparative Multicenter Clinical Study of Glaukos® Trabecular Micro-Bypass System Model iS3 Infinite® vs. Hydrus® in Adult Subjects With Primary Open-Angle Glaucoma (POAG)

brief_summary.textblock: A study to compare the iStent Infinite product to the Hydrus product in the treatment of open-angle glaucoma

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Mean Diurnal Intraocular Pressure
primary_outcome.description: Change in Mean Diurnal Intraocular Pressure (measured as an average of 3 measurements taken at 08:00, 12:00, and 16:00) from Baseline over time at Month6, Month 12, and Month 24

arm_group.description: Subjects implanted with iStent Infinite system
Subjects implanted with Hydrus device system

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of Primary Open-Angle Glaucoma (POAG) or Secondary Pseudoexfoliative Glacoma (PEXG) or Secondary Pigmentary Glaucoma (PG)
- Medicated on 1 to 3 ocular hypotensive medications at screening
- Pseudophakic with posterior chamber intraocular lens implant and cataract surgery performed at least 90 days prior to baseline visit
- Study eye screening Best Sphere Corrected Visual Acuity of 20/80 or better
- Gonioscopy assessment of Shaffer angle grade of >= 3
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any other type of glaucoma including, but not limited to: traumatic glaucoma, angle recession glaucoma, uveitic glaucoma, neovascular glaucoma, angle closure glaucoma (ACG) and glaucoma associated with vascular disorders
- Selective laser trabeculoplasty (SLT), peripheral laser iridotomy (PI) within 90 days prior to screening
- Any other glaucoma surgery of any type
- Subject actively enrolled in any other investigational trial or have participated within 30 days of the screening exam
- Women who are pregnant or plan to be pregnant during the study
